まま.translation: as is, still (in the current state)

書き方.translation: how to write, way of writing

何度.translation: how many degrees, how many times

月初め.translation: at the beginning of the month

長話.translation: long conversation, talk for a long time

開店.translation: opening of a store, setting up

町中.translation: the downtown area, the central area of a town

都内.translation: in the metropolitan area of Tokyo

当分.translation: for some time, for the present

割り引く.translation: give a discount, make a reduction

役立つ.translation: be of use, serve a purpose

早まる.translation: make a hasty decision, jump the gun

発熱.translation: generation of heat, get a fever

かっと.translation: lose one's temper, fly into a rage

正座.translation: sitting upright with legs folded under one

見比べる.translation: look from one to another, compare

寄り道.translation: dropping by, going out of the way

隣り合う.translation: adjoin, be next door to each other

初詣で.translation: first shrine visit of the new year
